input.sentences: my nephew and his bride went to location for their honeymoon .
the night they arrived | they watched the sunset .
[male] is a clown and acts like a child at the beach .
the newlyweds buried themselves in the sand and watched the ocean .
after all that sun | the fair-skinned bride had a bit of sunburn so they spent the afternoon in the hotel .
output.sentences: Her Nephew was enjoying the location of the honeymoon.
They watched the sunset at night.
He was truly a male clown child.
The couple watched the views while laying on the sand next to the ocean.
His wife got a sunburn from sun exposure from all the time spent outside.
